clang++     -stdlib=libc++ -lc++abi CMakeFiles/sample.dir/source/main.c.o CMakeFiles/sample.dir/source/opencl.c.o CMakeFiles/sample.dir/source/image.c.o CMakeFiles/sample.dir/source/image-opencl.c.o CMakeFiles/sample.dir/source/display.c.o CMakeFiles/sample.dir/source/texture.c.o CMakeFiles/sample.dir/source/vertexBuffer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/sample.dir/source/indexBuffer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/sample.dir/source/vertexArray.cpp.o CMakeFiles/sample.dir/source/shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/sample.dir/source/renderer.cpp.o  -o sample  -lm -lpthread -lpng -stdlib=libc++ /usr/lib64/libOpenCL.so.1 /usr/lib64/libOpenGL.so /usr/lib64/libGLX.so /usr/lib64/libGLU.so /usr/lib64/libglut.so /usr/lib64/libXmu.so /usr/lib64/libXi.so /usr/lib64/libGLEW.so /usr/lib64/libGLEW.so
